verses.text: Now it pleased \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w to|strong="H1868"\w* appoint 120 satraps \w to|strong="H1868"\w* rule throughout \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w them|strong="H5922"\w* three administrators, including Daniel, \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* these satraps \w were|strong="H1934"\w* accountable \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* king \w would|strong="H1934"\w* not suffer loss.

\w Soon|strong="H4481"\w*, \w by|strong="H4481"\w* \w his|strong="H4481"\w* extraordinary spirit, \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* distinguished himself \w among|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* administrators \w and|strong="H4430"\w* satraps. \w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* planned \w to|strong="H4481"\w* set \w him|strong="H4481"\w* \w over|strong="H5924"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* whole kingdom.

\w Thus|strong="H1836"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* administrators \w and|strong="H4430"\w* satraps \w sought|strong="H1934"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* charge \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*, \w but|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w could|strong="H1768"\w* find \w no|strong="H3606"\w* charge \w or|strong="H4430"\w* corruption, \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* trustworthy, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w no|strong="H3606"\w* negligence \w or|strong="H4430"\w* corruption \w was|strong="H1934"\w* found \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*.

Finally these \w men|strong="H4437"\w* said, “\w We|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* never \w find|strong="H7912"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* charge \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1932"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* unless \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w find|strong="H7912"\w* something \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* law \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* God.”

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* administrators \w and|strong="H1841"\w* satraps \w went|strong="H1841"\w* together \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* king \w and|strong="H1841"\w* said, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* King Darius, may \w you|strong="H1768"\w* live forever!

\w All|strong="H5957"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w royal|strong="H4430"\w* administrators, prefects, satraps, advisers, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* governors \w have|strong="H1868"\w* agreed \w that|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w should|strong="H4430"\w* establish \w an|strong="H4430"\w* ordinance \w and|strong="H4430"\w* enforce \w a|strong="H3068"\w* decree \w that|strong="H5922"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* thirty days anyone who petitions any god \w or|strong="H4430"\w* man except \w you|strong="H5922"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w will|strong="H4430"\w* \w be|strong="H5957"\w* thrown into \w the|strong="H5922"\w* den \w of|strong="H4430"\w* lions.

\w Therefore|strong="H3606"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w establish|strong="H6966"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* decree \w and|strong="H4430"\w* sign \w the|strong="H3606"\w* document \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w it|strong="H4481"\w* cannot be changed—\w in|strong="H4430"\w* accordance with \w the|strong="H3606"\w* law \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Medes \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Persians, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* cannot be repealed.”
Therefore \w King|strong="H4430"\w* Darius \w signed|strong="H7560"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w written|strong="H7560"\w* \w decree|strong="H1882"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H4430"\w* when Daniel learned \w that|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w document|strong="H3792"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* been \w signed|strong="H7560"\w*, \w he|strong="H6903"\w* went into \w his|strong="H3606"\w* house, where \w the|strong="H3606"\w* windows \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* upper room opened toward Jerusalem, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* three times \w a|strong="H3068"\w* day \w he|strong="H6903"\w* got down on \w his|strong="H3606"\w* knees, prayed, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* gave thanks \w to|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* God, \w just|strong="H6903"\w* \w as|strong="H3606"\w* \w he|strong="H6903"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* done \w before|strong="H6903"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6903"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* men \w went|strong="H5954"\w* \w as|strong="H3606"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* group \w and|strong="H1005"\w* found \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* petitioning \w and|strong="H1005"\w* imploring \w his|strong="H5922"\w* God.

So they approached \w the|strong="H6925"\w* king \w and|strong="H1841"\w* \w asked|strong="H1156"\w* about \w his|strong="H6925"\w* royal decree: “Did you not sign \w a|strong="H3068"\w* decree \w that|strong="H1400"\w* \w for|strong="H1156"\w* thirty days any \w man|strong="H1400"\w* who petitions any god or \w man|strong="H1400"\w* except you, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* king, will \w be|strong="H1841"\w* thrown into \w the|strong="H6925"\w* den \w of|strong="H6925"\w* lions?” \w The|strong="H6925"\w* king replied, “According \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* law \w of|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* Medes \w and|strong="H1841"\w* Persians \w the|strong="H6925"\w* order stands, \w and|strong="H1841"\w* \w it|strong="H6925"\w* cannot \w be|strong="H1841"\w* repealed.”

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* told \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, “Daniel, one \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* exiles \w from|strong="H4481"\w* Judah, shows \w no|strong="H3809"\w* regard \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w or|strong="H3809"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w decree|strong="H1882"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H1768"\w* \w signed|strong="H7560"\w*. \w He|strong="H1768"\w* still \w makes|strong="H1156"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w petition|strong="H1156"\w* three times \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3118"\w*.”

\w As|strong="H1768"\w* \w soon|strong="H4481"\w* \w as|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* heard \w this|strong="H5922"\w*, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* deeply distressed \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w set|strong="H7761"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* mind \w on|strong="H5922"\w* delivering \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* labored until sundown \w to|strong="H5922"\w* rescue \w him|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* men approached \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* together \w and|strong="H4430"\w* said \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*, “Remember, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w by|strong="H7761"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* law \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Medes \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Persians no decree \w or|strong="H4430"\w* ordinance established \w by|strong="H7761"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w can|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* changed.”

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* gave \w the|strong="H3606"\w* order, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* brought Daniel \w and|strong="H4430"\w* threw \w him|strong="H5922"\w* into \w the|strong="H3606"\w* den \w of|strong="H4430"\w* lions. \w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* said \w to|strong="H5922"\w* Daniel, “May \w your|strong="H1768"\w* God, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* serve continually, deliver \w you|strong="H1768"\w*!”

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* stone \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w brought|strong="H1841"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* placed over \w the|strong="H1768"\w* mouth \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w den|strong="H1358"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* sealed \w it|strong="H1932"\w* \w with|strong="H1841"\w* \w his|strong="H7804"\w* own signet ring \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w with|strong="H1841"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* rings \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H7804"\w* nobles, \w so|strong="H1768"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* nothing concerning \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w could|strong="H1768"\w* \w be|strong="H1841"\w* changed.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w went|strong="H1841"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* palace \w and|strong="H4430"\w* spent \w the|strong="H5922"\w* night fasting. \w No|strong="H3809"\w* entertainment \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w brought|strong="H1841"\w* \w before|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* sleep fled \w from|strong="H8133"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*.

At \w the|strong="H5922"\w* first light \w of|strong="H4430"\w* dawn, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* got \w up|strong="H6925"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* hurried \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* den \w of|strong="H4430"\w* lions.

\w When|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* reached \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w den|strong="H1358"\w*, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* cried \w out|strong="H6966"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* voice \w of|strong="H4430"\w* anguish, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* Daniel, servant \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* living God, \w has|strong="H1768"\w* \w your|strong="H1768"\w* God, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* serve continually, been able \w to|strong="H4430"\w* deliver \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* lions?”
\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w replied|strong="H6032"\w*, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w may|strong="H2417"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* live forever!

\w My|strong="H4430"\w* God sent His angel \w and|strong="H4430"\w* shut \w the|strong="H5974"\w* mouths \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5974"\w* lions. They \w have|strong="H4430"\w* not hurt me, \w for|strong="H2418"\w* I \w was|strong="H1841"\w* found innocent \w in|strong="H4430"\w* His sight, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* I \w have|strong="H4430"\w* done no wrong \w against|strong="H5974"\w* you, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* overjoyed \w and|strong="H4430"\w* gave orders \w to|strong="H6925"\w* lift Daniel \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* den, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w when|strong="H1768"\w* Daniel \w was|strong="H4430"\w* lifted \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* den, \w no|strong="H3809"\w* wounds \w whatsoever|strong="H3606"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* on \w him|strong="H6925"\w*, \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* trusted \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H7972"\w* God.

\w At|strong="H7912"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* command \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* men \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* falsely accused \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w brought|strong="H1841"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* thrown into \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w den|strong="H1358"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* lions—\w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* children \w and|strong="H4430"\w* wives. \w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w before|strong="H4481"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* reached \w the|strong="H3606"\w* bottom \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w den|strong="H1358"\w*, \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lions overpowered \w them|strong="H5922"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* crushed \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* bones.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w King|strong="H4430"\w* Darius wrote \w to|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w people|strong="H1400"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w every|strong="H3606"\w* nation \w and|strong="H4430"\w* language throughout \w the|strong="H3606"\w* land: “May \w your|strong="H1768"\w* prosperity abound.

\w I|strong="H1768"\w* hereby decree \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H1753"\w* \w every|strong="H3606"\w* part \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w my|strong="H4430"\w* kingdom, men \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w to|strong="H1868"\w* tremble \w in|strong="H1753"\w* fear before \w the|strong="H3606"\w* God \w of|strong="H4430"\w* Daniel: \w For|strong="H1768"\w* \w He|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w living|strong="H1753"\w* God, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w He|strong="H1768"\w* endures forever; \w His|strong="H1768"\w* kingdom \w will|strong="H1768"\w* never \w be|strong="H8001"\w* destroyed, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w His|strong="H1768"\w* dominion \w will|strong="H1768"\w* never end.

\w He|strong="H1768"\w* delivers \w and|strong="H4437"\w* rescues; \w He|strong="H1768"\w* performs signs \w and|strong="H4437"\w* wonders \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* heavens \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w on|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* earth, \w for|strong="H5705"\w* \w He|strong="H1768"\w* \w has|strong="H1768"\w* rescued \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* power \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lions.”

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* prospered during \w the|strong="H4481"\w* reign \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Darius \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* reign \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Cyrus \w the|strong="H4481"\w* Persian.
